articles.title: In ‘Super Pumped,’ the Uber Founder Disrupts His Own Rise - The New York Times
articles.description: A new Showtime anthology series starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt chronicles the rise of Uber — and the ruthless tactics of its ousted chief executive, Travis Kalanick.
articles.content:
Gurley eventually staged a coup to oust Kalanick from the company, but only after supporting Kalanick for years.
